name: Get Out of MY House
description:
Get Out of MY House is a 1v1 multiplayer game about priestesses and ghosts who want to live in a house, but will not accept the presence of each other.

Ghosts should haunt the furniture of the house, while the priestesses have to exorcise whathever is haunted. Whoever do best, will keep the house!

Made for Global Game Jam 2019, By:
Angela (Instagram @chromepink)
Diego G.R
Saly (Twitter @salycrafts)
Rodrigo Enoque
